content: My first girlfriend turned into the moon...
I'm not a murderer, I don't know what to do
Sometimes you need to look inward and ask yourself, who are you and what do you want?
Thank you!! Finally someone who gets me
Who is this?? I know its you Katara
You do realize she's blind right? She won't ever see this..
What's wrong with you Azula, Zuko will always have our love and care
That's right, the fire nation is going down!! No offense Zuko and Iroh..
None taken, she is crazy and she needs to go down
